title: OT68: Necronomicomment
summary:
Key ideas:
- This is a bi-weekly visible open thread for people to post anything they want.
- Arbital has an interactive page with Scott's 2017 predictions.
- Scott made bets with readers regarding Trump's cabinet picks and owes someone money.
- Aceso Under Glass has thoughts on Trump's latest actions and donating to the ACLU is recommended.
- Comment of the week is Vidur Kapur on studies of saturated fat and the Mediterranean Diet.

Key learnings:
- There is an open forum for people to post on anything they want.
- Arbital has an interactive page for Scott's 2017 predictions.
- Scott had made some bets regarding Trump's cabinet picks.
- Aceso Under Glass has thoughts on Trump's latest actions.
- Vidur Kapur had a comment on studies of saturated fat and the Mediterranean Diet.

Key questions:
- Who does Scott owe money to regarding his Trump cabinet pick bets?
- What are Aceso Under Glass' thoughts on Trump's latest actions? 
- What is the comment of the week by Vidur Kapur about the Mediterranean Diet?
